node.title: Saves time and commisions
node.content: So far, I haven't found a better tool than [funnel]. This tool allows you to enter the plus and increase the number of transactions. It is also a big commsion saver.
node.author: Asger A.

node.title: Focuses on profits
node.content: a wonderful innovation - [funnel] software suits me by the fact that the work takes place 24 hours a day, thereby increasing the profit. And for me, this is the most important thing.
node.author: Božidar M.

node.title: Keeps working
node.content: I very often got into a strop trading and lose my money because of this. Thanks to [funnel] I do not lose control of my emotions. It is very easy to enter and withdraw money too
node.author: Dennis R.
